about_the_game:
Civilization no longer exists. Governments have fallen. Lustful armies now populate our cities. Twisted human desires roaming and consuming all. The Apocalypse has arrived! 

The battle for the Planet has begun! Join the hottest women's resistance in their fight against lustful hordes. Delve into the mind and the darkest and most lustful desires of your girls and fuck them until you please every corner of their unleashed ecstasy and become the man chosen to lead them to recover the world! 

Características principales

  • Join the resistance formed by formidable ladies in the fight for the Earth.

  • Collect journals with the darkest and hottest confessions from each girl.

  • Unlock more than 50+ erotic scenes and 50+ H-scenes

  • Customize your character with the best equipment

  • Improve & evolve hundreds of anti-zombies weapons.

  • Loot enemies across the world Battle against creepy monsters

  • Complete numerous missions around three worlds

  • Build a great and powerful hideout 

 

PLEASE NOTE! 

Undead Lust is completely free to play, but some game items can also be purchased for real money. Undead Lust requires an Internet connection to play. 

Undead Lust is a global obscene experience created and developed by Wet & Wild Works that is sure to keep you entertained. Undead Lust, is published by Gameyond, makers of other fun games like Eros Fantasy.

content_descriptors.notes: As you unlock and upgrade your characters, you will be able to unlock pages of their intimate diary where you will be able to read their sexual fantasies, as well as erotic and explicit photos.

name: Undead Lust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
